content: inspiration in the next part you will find the pattern for two different fruit types but feel free to google as you know the internet is full of tons of free fruit patterns but don t worry at some point i will add some more fruit to this 7 fruit strawberry 1 round 5 single_crochet in magic_ring join chain 1 5 2 round single_crochet in each stitch around join chain 5 3 round 2 single_crochet into each stitch join chain 1 10 4 round single_crochet in each stitch around join chain 1 10 5 round 2 single_crochet in first st single_crochet in next 1 repeat around join chain 1 15 6 round single_crochet in each stitch around join chain 1 15 7 round decrease single_crochet in next repeat around join chain 1 10 8 round decrease around join fasten_off 5 stem 1 round 5 single_crochet in magic_ring join 5 2 round *chain 2 slip_stitch in 2 chain from hook slip_stitch in next* repeat 4 more times 3 round chain 4 single_crochet in 2 chain from hook and the last 2 chain fasten_off pull the yarn through the middle of the magic_ring and your stam is ready to be put on your strawberry 8 lemon slice make 2 start with light yellow 1 round 6 single_crochet in magic_ring join chain 1 6 2 round 2 single_crochet into each stitch join chain 1 12 3 round 2 single_crochet in first st single_crochet in next repeat around join chain 1 18 change to dark yellow 4 round 2 single_crochet in first st single_crochet in next 2 repeat around join fasten_off 24 now with white yarn stitch on the white stuff sorry but i don t know the name of it let me know if you do of the lemon align your two pieces with the right sides out and whipstitch them together with dark yellow if you want to make a segment just make one piece fold it in half and stitch the edges together for a kiwi slice start with white yarn and change to green after the first round 9 congratulations when you re reading this you mastered this pattern and i hope it was understandable enough now the only thing left is sewing all those parts together or as in my case use your glue gun for attaching the parts don t forget the eyes and mouth you can either use safety eyes or stitch them on i prefer using puff paint or pearl maker pens 10
